# File lib/json/editor.rb, line 1184
1184:       def load_file(filename)
1185:         if filename
1186:           if File.directory?(filename)
1187:             Editor.error_dialog(self, "Try to select a JSON file!")
1188:             return
1189:           else
1190:             data = read_data(filename)
1191:             @filename = filename
1192:             toplevel.display_status("Loaded data from '#@filename'.")
1193:             display_title
1194:             return data
1195:           end
1196:         end
1197:       end
